data.comment: The match has started, with Kortrijk kicking-off.
Lukas Nmecha is on target to give Anderlecht a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 30, Great finish from Percy Tau to give Anderlecht a 0-2 lead.
Jonathan Lardot blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has commenced. Anderlecht with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Habib Gueye is replacing Eric Ocansey for Kortrijk at Guldensporenstadion.
Francis Amuzu is on a sub for Mustapha Bundu for Anderlecht.
Goal! Anderlecht extend their lead to 0-3 through Lukas Nmecha.
In the minute 68, Francis Amuzu is booked for the away team.
Yves Vanderhaeghe (Kortrijk) is making a second substitution, with Luqman Hakim replacing Petar Golubovic.
The away team replace Percy Tau with Joshua Cullen.
In the minute 84, Jovan Stojanovic is replacing Michiel Jonckheere for the home team.
Vincent Kompany is making the team's third substitution at Guldensporenstadion with Nany Dimata replacing Lukas Nmecha.
In the minute 87, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Kortrijk.
Goal! Kortrijk now trail just 1-3 thanks to a Ilombe Mboyo spot-kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-3.
Bogdan Mykhaylichenko (Anderlecht) gets a yellow card.
